version_description:
1. Urgently fixed the problem of failure to send data
2. A new version is under development, supporting new features such as emoticons, sharing, pictures, etc.

1. The function of inputting and displaying expressions is added during text input, supporting many custom expressions
2. Added more fixed animations and patterns with Christmas and Thanksgiving elements
3. Solve the problem of crashes that have been discovered and optimize performance
4. Some new functions that have been developed need more time to test, and more new functions are still under development. The APP will be updated continuously in the future.

1. Add more fixed animations
2. Solve the discovered problems and optimize the code
3. Some new functions that have been developed need more time to test, and more new functions are still under development. The APP will be updated continuously in the future.
Fix problems that have been discovered
